title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.11 - Waste
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.11 - Waste

State Regulations
(a) All sewage, including liquid waste, is to be disposed of in a sanitary sewer, an approved subsurface disposal system, or in a holding tank. (b) Temporary food service establishments and the immediate vicinity of the operation are to be kept clean and free from litter. Trash and rubbish containers with plastic bag liners are to be provided for garbage and refuse disposal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-2.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
